root.name: PGA Tour 96
root.description: OverviewPGA Tour 96 is a golf game which was developed by multiple developers and published by Electronic Arts.Game Boy VersionTitle ScreenThe Game Boy version of PGA Tour 96 features three modes of play on five different real world golf courses. PGA Tour 96 can be played two player with players taking turns using the same Game Boy.Game ModesThere are three different modes that can be played in PGA Tour 96:Practice a RoundPlay in a TournamentSkins ChallengeCoursesThere are five courses based on real world locations:Summerlin - Las Vegas, NVSawgrass - Pointe Vedra, FLAvenel - Potomac, MDWoodlands - Houston, TXScottsdale, AZ
